video_prompt: Young woman, sailor uniform. Eyes shift upwards, subtly conveying curiosity. Hair bows and uniform details flutter gently as she breathes. Background elements subtly drift and blur, indicative of an indoor setting with light moving.
image_prompt: AI-generated overhead portrait of a young woman looking up with expressive eyes. She has fair skin with pink cheeks and lips, dark brown hair with bangs and pigtails adorned with pink bows. She wears a white sailor-style shirt with pink accents and a red-pink bow, a light brown skirt with pink checkered pleats, and dark brown shoes with white socks. Softly blurred indoor background with a light blue floor scattered with brown objects. Bright lighting, soft shadows. Cute and gentle atmosphere.
refined_video_prompt: Her gaze subtly lifts, curiosity dawning in her expression. The sailor uniform's fabric gently undulates, mirroring her subtle posture shifts and soft breathing. Hair bows flutter delicately. In the background, elements drift, blurring slightly as light dynamically shifts, suggesting an active indoor environment.
